website_summaries.verdict: This award-winning toner uses AHAs, BHAs, and a proprietary botanical blend to clean and shrink pores without stripping the skin.
pros: Toner visibly cleans off impurities that other cleansers have left behind, leaving skin feeling fresh
Absorbs quickly with a pleasant tingle that feels cooling and calming
cons: Some users say it leaves behind a sticky residue

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: A cult-favorite, I use it especially after I pick at my blackheads. Works great to reduce inflammation while working to balance sebum and fight congestion/acne. I've used it a lot in the last year, I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for combination skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite toner. I have combination skin and this toner does not strip my skin of moisture. It opens my pores and feels incredibly refreshing without drying my skin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M

customer_reviews.title: Ive been using this twice a day for a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this twice a day for a week now and I can already tell a difference in my complexion. Most, not all my acne has cleared up and my skin is less oily then before.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Safety seal broken
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to see that the safety seal was half off and am now questioning if the product was tampered with. I’ve bought this in Sephora and it smells the same but who knows for sure if it was watered down or worse? Not happy
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Yes Queen
customer_reviews.text: Since using this product in my regimen I have noticed a significant decrease in breakouts after daily use for a month! My previous hyperpigmentation has disappeared and it smells wonderful. I would love it if the product wasn’t so expensive but it works!
customer_reviews.author: veliza

customer_reviews.text: Had to return.... Got refund on some of their items but still stuck with a Bag full.... NOT HAPPY

customer_reviews.title: new staple!
customer_reviews.text: Im obsessed this helps prevent breakouts!! And keeps my skin feeling tight and fresh! It is now a necessity for me
customer_reviews.author: emily lopez

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!!
customer_reviews.text: Do your skin a favor and buy this amazing product. You’ll be shocked to see the makeup left on your face after washing it. This removes everything for a nice clean and refreshing feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and so far is keeping my skin clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and tingly but did not work for clearing up my acne. Bought this, the face wash and the moisturizer. Nopeeeee
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Santana

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This toner is amazing. If you have acne & have oily skin, it is a must buy. This is the best toner that I have used, and I've used plenty to compare. It doesn't smell perfect but you will see your skin change within few days.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Kim

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my skin is horribly oily, used twice a day for 3 months...total waste of money. Good marketing so props to the marketing team. Burned my face for a solid 3 weeks until I got used to it, the smell is SO strong and I saw absolutely no difference in my oiliness. Going back to my $10 witch hazel toner.
customer_reviews.author: J Huddy

product_meta.title: OLEHENRIKSEN Ole Henriksen BALANCING FORCE OIL CONTROL TONER 6.5 oz
product_meta.description: Controls oil, helps minimize the appearance of pores and freshens skin This concentrated facial astringent effectively removes excess oil and refines pores—without stripping skin. It’s formulated with Green Fusion Complex, a proprietary blend of potent active botanicals—green tea, eucalyptus, algae (kelp) and Irish moss extracts—with natural antiseptic properties. With a powerful blend of both BHA and alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs)—salicylic, glycolic and lactic acids—and neem seed oil, its gentle clarifying action helps unclog, purify and minimize the appearance of pores. This refreshing toner features an energizing eucalyptus-peppermint scent. Instantly, the complexion is fresh and invigorated with a matte, healthy-looking Ole Glow.
